languages.text: "Я устал бегать за вами, словно послушный пес. Ждать одобрения, трястись над каждым словом. Простите, но я не принимаю ваши чувства".

traits.locale_text: "Я устал бегать за вами, словно послушный пес. Ждать одобрения, трястись над каждым словом. Простите, но я не принимаю ваши чувства".

languages.text: "I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."
languages.original_text: "Я устал бегать за вами, словно послушный пес. Ждать одобрения, трястись над каждым словом. Простите, но я не принимаю ваши чувства".

traits.locale_text: "I am tired of chasing around you like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."
"I am tired of chasing around you like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."
"I am tired of chasing around you like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."
"I am tired of chasing around you like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."
"I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."

languages.text: “我已经受够了像一条听话的狗一样，每天围着你打转。我厌倦了等待你倨傲的认可，厌倦了为你的每一句话提心吊胆。很遗憾，卡西娅，我拒绝你的邀请。”
languages.original_text: "I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."

traits.locale_text: “我已经受够了像一条听话的狗一样，每天围着你打转。我厌倦了等待你倨傲的认可，厌倦了为你的每一句话提心吊胆。很遗憾，卡西娅，我拒绝你的邀请。”

languages.text: "Ich bin es leid, Euch wie ein gehorsamer Hund hinterherzurennen. Leid, auf Eure Anerkennung zu warten, mir wegen jedem Wort von Euch den Kopf zu zerbrechen. Es tut mir leid, Cassia, doch ich akzeptiere Eure Gefühle nicht."
languages.original_text: "I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin es leid, Euch wie ein gehorsamer Hund hinterherzurennen. Leid, auf Eure Anerkennung zu warten, mir wegen jedem Wort von Euch den Kopf zu zerbrechen. Es tut mir leid, Cassia, doch ich akzeptiere Eure Gefühle nicht."

languages.text: « J'en ai assez de vous courir après comme un petit chien obéissant. Assez d'attendre votre accord, de me ronger les sangs à chacune de vos paroles. Je suis {mf|désolé|désolée}, Cassia, mais je n'accepte pas vos sentiments. »
languages.original_text: "I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai assez de vous courir après comme un petit chien obéissant. Assez d'attendre votre accord, de me ronger les sangs à chacun de vos mots. Je suis {mf|désolé|désolée}, Cassia, mais je n'accepte pas vos sentiments. »

languages.text: «Estoy cansado de perseguirla como un perro. Cansado de esperar su aprobación, de preocuparme por cada una de sus palabras. Lo siento, Cassia, pero no le correspondo».
languages.original_text: "I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy cansado de perseguirla como un perro. Cansado de esperar su aprobación, de preocuparme por cada una de sus palabras. Lo siento, Cassia, pero no le correspondo».

languages.text: 「私は従順な犬のようにあなたの後を追いかけるのに疲れた。あなたの承認を待つことや、あなたのすべての言葉に思い悩むのに疲れた。申し訳ない、カシア殿、私はあなたの感情を受け入れられない」
languages.original_text: "I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."

traits.locale_text: 「私は従順な犬のようにあなたの後を追いかけるのに疲れた。あなたの承認を待つことや、あなたのすべての言葉に思い悩むのに疲れた。申し訳ない、カシア殿、私はあなたの感情を受け入れられない」

languages.text: "Köpek gibi peşinde koşturmaktan bıktım. Gözüne gireceğim diye çırpınmaktan, her sözünde anlam aramaktan usandım. Kusura bakma Cassia ama duygularını kabul edemeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I am tired of chasing you around like an obedient dog. Tired of waiting for your approval, of fretting over your every word. I am sorry, Cassia, but I do not accept your feelings."
